channel.title: Minefall <Hardcore PvP> <Heroes> <Factions> <Iconomy> <WAR> NO WHITELIST!
channel.description:
Server IP: 69.162.80.146 Website: Minefall.com
About the server... Minefall is based on around what a good PvP server should be based around! Plain simple fun with balanced classes and a great community.
Features Factions,heroes,custom warzones, grinding area's (pvp enabled),Server events for great prizes such as gunpowder,diamonds. Very user-friendly MALL,Player shops to sell your goods to other players.
Come check out the fun! and start a faction with friends, or create a new faction and invite new upcoming friends
